DOC.brief_summary: The aim is to evaluate whether Minimum Dose CT (MnDCT) is useful in the management of patients post Lung Biopsy
DOC.brief_title: Minimum Dose CT Post Lung Biopsy
DOC.detailed_description: Patients post Lung Biopsy have a chest X-ray (CXR) and a MnDCT post lung biopsy. Both studies are compared for the detection of a pneumothorax
DOC.criteria: All Patients having a lung biopsy
